readable.title: 1351315701_6580b51c41
readable.content: A black and a white dog are running on the grass . A black dog and a white dog race in a grassy field while spectators look on . A white dog and a black dog running side by side on the grass while onlookers watch . Two dogs , a pitbull and a black Labrador , run side by side . Two dogs racing in a field , with people looking on .
